mapper.select: select dept_id, dept_code, dept_short_name, dept_name, parent_dept, dept_address, dept_intro, dept_remark, dept_state, dept_del from dept_tb
mapper.insert: insert into dept_tb (dept_id, dept_code, dept_short_name, dept_name, parent_dept, dept_address, dept_intro, dept_remark, dept_state, dept_del, dept_url) values (#{deptId},#{deptCode},#{deptShortName},#{deptName},#{parentDept},#{deptAddress},#{deptIntro},#{deptRemark},#{deptState},#{deptDel})
mapper.select: select count(dept_id) from dept_tb where dept_del = 0
